examples: Steps leading from the kitchen to the cellar.
8 steps that paved the way to the Civil Rights Act of 1964.
It is out of step with changes in industry.
She felt for the step with her foot.
The teacher highlighted the correct steps to solve the math problem.
words.defineEn: the act of raising one's foot and putting it down in a different place in order to walk or run
words.defineVi: hành động nhấc chân lên và đặt nó xuống một nơi khác để đi bộ hoặc chạy

examples: Adults were also at risk from epidemics.
The child's cry of fear alerted the adults to the presence of a spider.
The child will become an adult.
Adults have the freedom to make their own decisions and choices.
As an adult, she took on the responsibilities of her career and family.
words.defineEn: a fully grown man or woman
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông hoặc phụ nữ trưởng thành hoàn toàn

examples: Teaching methods will take various forms.
People around the world enjoy various forms of music as a universal language.
Our next class will take the form of a debate.
Evidence of their relationship exists in the form of a series of letters.
Please return the completed form at your earliest convenience.
words.defineEn: the appearance of someone or something
words.defineVi: sự xuất hiện của một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: She felt her mother's death very deeply.
Her death should serve as a warning to other young people.
He met his death in 1946.
Today's lecture bored me to death.
Some of my patients are actually staring death in the face.
words.defineEn: the end of life; the act of dying
words.defineVi: cuối đời; hành động chết

examples: Leave him in his cell.
The prisoners are allowed out of their cells for two hours a day.
Repairing or regrowing damaged brain cells is the end of the rainbow for neuroscience research.
The cancer patient underwent radiation therapy to target and destroy cancer cells.
Imagine two criminals, partners in crime, who are arrested and placed in separate cells with no means of communication.
words.defineEn: (biology) an organism's smallest unit, capable of functioning on its own
words.defineVi: (sinh học) đơn vị nhỏ nhất của sinh vật, có khả năng tự hoạt động

examples: After all, love will find a way.
He loved gardening.
They loved the sun-dried tomato and mozzarella-filled pansotti.
I love the vibrant green color of Granny Smith apples.
I love the crunch of romaine lettuce in my sandwiches.
words.defineEn: the very strong emotion we have for someone or something that is important to us and we like a lot and want to take care of
words.defineVi: cảm xúc rất mạnh mẽ mà chúng ta dành cho ai đó hoặc điều gì đó quan trọng đối với chúng ta và chúng ta rất thích và muốn chăm sóc

examples: The storekeeper changed my dollar bill for four quarters.
I have zero dollars in my wallet.
She has seventy dollars in her wallet.
You can afford a dollar for a good cause.
She looks a million dollars in her elegant evening gown and flawless makeup.
words.defineEn: the unit of money in the US, Canada, Australia and several other countries, equal to 100 cents
words.defineVi: đơn vị tiền ở Hoa Kỳ, Canada, Úc và một số quốc gia khác, bằng 100 xu

examples: The cameras clicked away.
Cameras triggered by cars running red lights at intersections.
The cameras catch motorists who break the speed limit.
The cell phone camera has become the fly on the wall, so to speak.
I'm afraid we can't recover the pictures - your camera is beyond recall.
words.defineEn: a device or piece of equipment for taking photographs, making movies or television programs
words.defineVi: một thiết bị hoặc một phần của thiết bị để chụp ảnh, làm phim hoặc chương trình truyền hình

examples: That DJ's voice really sets my teeth on edge.
A voice came from the kitchen.
His voice dropped to a whisper.
Those coffin nails are going to hurt your voice.
Her voice broke as she relived the experience.
words.defineEn: the sounds that a person makes when speaking or singing
words.defineVi: những âm thanh mà một người làm khi nói hoặc hát

examples: Close the door, please.
Which door leads to the yard?
right on cue the door opened
That accident battered up the door of my car.
The driver of the car opened the car door for the passengers.
words.defineEn: the thing we move to enter, exit, or access a place such as a vehicle, building, room, etc.
words.defineVi: thứ chúng ta di chuyển để vào, ra hoặc tiếp cận một địa điểm như xe cộ, tòa nhà, phòng, v.v.

examples: Give me a call tomorrow.
They're busting a move tomorrow.
We have to learn one of Hamlet's speeches for school tomorrow.
The charges against the suspect will come up in court tomorrow.
The President hits town tomorrow.
words.defineEn: the day that will come after today ends
words.defineVi: ngày sẽ đến sau ngày hôm nay kết thúc

examples: She valued the high nutritional content and low-calorie nature of asparagus in his diet.
The new policy sits well with the company's values.
Enhance the flavor and nutritional value of your smoothies by adding powdered red algae as a nutrient-rich ingredient.
A retail group which sets great store by traditional values.
She needed to prioritize her own needs and values.
words.defineEn: the worth of something in money
words.defineVi: giá trị của một cái gì đó bằng tiền

examples: In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
All members of the band equally share the band's profits.
In the wake of the scandal, several committee members resigned.
The company's recent collapse has left their pension fund members up the creek.
The members of the band are like peas in a pod.
words.defineEn: someone or something that is in a specific group, club, or organization
words.defineVi: ai đó hoặc cái gì đó trong một nhóm, câu lạc bộ hoặc tổ chức cụ thể

examples: Every relationship has a lot of ups and downs.
The siblings' relationship was a cat-and-dog life.
A stable relationship stands the test of time.
Evidence of their relationship exists in the form of a series of letters.
It puts a damper on our relationship.
words.defineEn: the connection among two or more things or people or the way in which they are connected
words.defineVi: sự kết nối giữa hai hoặc nhiều thứ hoặc con người hoặc cách thức mà chúng được kết nối

examples: His laughter stopped as quickly as it had begun.
The child's laughter reminded me that little fish are sweet, and that sometimes the simplest things can bring the greatest joy.
When I saw the old photograph, memories of my childhood home and the sounds of my mother's laughter sprang into my mind.
They say that laughter is the best medicine, and I truly believe it helps lift my mood.
They sat in a circle, passing around a box of areca nuts, engaging in lively discussions and laughter.
words.defineEn: the action of laughing or the sound it makes
words.defineVi: hành động cười hoặc âm thanh mà nó tạo ra

examples: The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The girl held her father's hand tightly.
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
These girls play for keeps.
The poor girl was almost beside herself.
words.defineEn: someone who is a child and a female
words.defineVi: một người là một đứa trẻ và một phụ nữ

examples: Boys his age are a law unto themselves.
In his mother’s eyes, the boy can do no wrong.
Boy meets girl, boy loses girl, yadda yadda yadda.
A boy took us to our room.
"That boy isn't very bright."
words.defineEn: someone who is a child and a male
words.defineVi: một người là một đứa trẻ và một người đàn ông

examples: Save data frequently.
The scientist abstracted the data from various sources to analyze trends.
The teacher asked the students to collect data for their science project.
Processes to check against deterioration in the quality of the data held.
He gained a reputation as a smart number-cruncher who could turn data into policy.
words.defineEn: information or facts collected to be used for analysis or reference
words.defineVi: thông tin hoặc sự kiện được thu thập để sử dụng cho phân tích hoặc tham khảo

examples: Years of war have left their mark on these pretty islands.
Estimates put the war's cost at £1 million a day.
They all did their bit during the war.
At that time the war came upon us almost like a thief in the night.
The war continued to drag on indecisively.
words.defineEn: a state of armed fighting between two or more groups, nations, or states
words.defineVi: một tình trạng chiến đấu vũ trang giữa hai hoặc nhiều nhóm, quốc gia, hoặc tiểu bang

examples: We all felt the force of her arguments.
The school took the full force of the explosion.
The organization was forced to abandon its plans for expansion due to budget constraints.
The company CEO was forced to own up to the financial scandal.
The referee was forced to stop the game because of heavy snow.
words.defineEn: a physical power, strength, or energy that allows an object to change its motion or position
words.defineVi: một sức mạnh thể chất, sức mạnh hoặc năng lượng cho phép một đối tượng thay đổi chuyển động hoặc vị trí của nó

examples: I planned a surprise party for my little sister's birthday.
She planned a romantic candlelit meal for their anniversary.
They are planning a movie night at the movie theater with their family.
The plan ran into a brick wall.
The closing of the airport knocked our holiday plans on the head.
words.defineEn: a chain of actions that will help us reach our goals
words.defineVi: một chuỗi các hành động sẽ giúp chúng tôi đạt được mục tiêu của mình

examples: The company has just produced a luxury version of the aircraft.
He whipped up his own version of thousand island dressing using a secret blend of ingredients.
Lend an ear and listen to my version.
It was hard to tell the difference between the two versions.
Don’t try to boil the ocean with your first version of a product.
words.defineEn: a different form of something particular when compared with its previous form or forms
words.defineVi: một hình thức khác của một cái gì đó cụ thể khi so sánh với hình thức hoặc hình thức trước đó của nó

examples: The town is three miles away.
The rebels held the town for many weeks.
The French army held the town for three days.
Posters for the gig appeared all over town.
I know this town like the back of my hand.
words.defineEn: an area with human population that is smaller than a city and larger than a village
words.defineVi: một khu vực có dân số nhỏ hơn một thành phố và lớn hơn một ngôi làng

examples: The bakery offered gluten-free options for customers with dietary restrictions.
The vegetarian menu offers a delicious black bean burrito as a protein-packed option.
I'm always keeping my options open Sophia.
For a gluten-free option, substitute regular flour with almond flour in the cake recipe.
They finally added a delicious veggie burger option to their menu.
words.defineEn: something that can or may be chosen from a number of alternatives
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó có thể hoặc có thể được chọn từ một số lựa chọn thay thế

examples: Our trip is still very much up in the air.
We often take weekend trips to nearby cities for sightseeing and relaxation.
During the camping trip, we played a game of charades around the campfire.
She packed a small bag of peanuts for her road trip.
She has had a good time on her trip so far.
words.defineEn: a journey that one goes on for pleasure or a particular purpose, generally for a short amount of time
words.defineVi: một cuộc hành trình mà một người tiếp tục vì niềm vui hoặc một mục đích cụ thể, thường là trong một khoảng thời gian ngắn
